alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 10:57AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Ransom, southwestern Cass and southeastern Barnes Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1056 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Enderlin, or 27 miles southeast of Valley City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Enderlin around 1105 AM CDT. Sheldon around 1110 AM CDT. Alice around 1120 AM CDT. Embden around 1125 AM CDT. Chaffee around 1130 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 320 and 324. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
